snippet: The practice, reported by The Indianapolis Star, was legal but raised questions about the security of the communications, some of which addressed sensitive topics....

headline.main: Bulls Top Golden State in Warriors' 1st Game Without Durant
headline.print_headline: Bulls Top Golden State in Warriors' 1st Game Without Durant

lead_paragraph: The practice, reported by The Indianapolis Star, was legal but raised questions about the security of the communications, some of which addressed sensitive topics.
